item.title: MacSSH 1.8.3
item.description:
What's New in MacSSH 1.8.3

  • Professional automatic update system with Sparkle framework
  • Background download and installation
  • Automatic app restart after update
  • Professional update UI with progress indicators
  • Digital signature verification for security
  • Enhanced SSH connection management
  • Improved file browser functionality
  • Better error handling and user feedback
